resources:
Super Routes https://superroutes-5378d-default-rtdb.europe-west1.firebasedatabase.app/
Strings in main activity Logo de la Aplicación Super routes Email Telephone Password Confirm Password Who are you? Guide Senderist Log in Forgot password? Log in using Google Don´t have an account? Sign up
Strings in sign up activity Name Surname
Strings in toolbar SUPER ROUTES
Strings in sign in activity Already have an account?
Strings in choose rol activity Welcome to You need to choose a rol to continue. If you log in as Guide, you\'ll be able to propose routes, but people may request you to be the guide in their routes. Choose a rol Go!
Strings in main menu guide activity You signed up as guide for these routes My Routes See routes done Create new route You do not have any route yet
Strings in activity main menu senderist Pick! Check out these new routes There are currently no proposals, come back later Or you can sign up for these routes My Routes My Groups
Strings in activity my routes senderist These are the routes you sign up for You didn\'t sing up for any route yet
Strings in menu activity What do you want to check? Sending message... MapsActivity Make a video Send a file Check symptoms Finish Route
Strings in position Position Latitude Longitude Position
Strings in position Coordinates Latitude Longitude See position on map
Strings in create new route Name Duration (hours) Nº participants Accept participants Write more information... Pick a route List of difficulty routes
Select difficulty
Easy
Medium
Hard
Experienced
Date Done
Strings in search bar Search new groups
Hello blank fragment
Strings in fragment card routes guide Start! Delete Some comments
String in fragment card routes senderist Difficulty: Date: Duration: Location: Join Close
Strings in waiting room before route starts Everybody Ready! Waiting for the guide to start. Press the button when everybody is ready.
Strings in menu senderist in route If activated, it will catch it if you fall down. You can chat with your fellows too! Check your location You can send pictures to the group!
Strings in waiting room senderist Waiting for the guide to start
Strings in route started guide Open chat Send pictures to the group Finish route
Strings in my groups (senderist) Create new group You aren\'t part of any group yet
Strings in create new group Name of the group Invite new members Add Select image Done
Strings in chat Write a message Send message New activity There is not a proposal yet... There were not enough votes Confirmed activity! You already voted
Strings in search bar Search Route
